data.name: Chains of Fury
data.detailed_description:
Check these

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1522360/Dinos_Reborn/
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1459980/Buried_in_Ice/
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1276510/Human_Farm


About the Game

This game is not for you if you want to save the world and become the hero everyone needs. Move along, we have an anti-hero bad-ass over here, ready to compete for the title of The Meanest Bastard Ever. His testosterone can only be measured in Fury scale, his death toll is unknown and the amount of bullets he'd shot is uncountable. He's a hired gun. His former clients had put him in prison instead of paying him for a job well done. He's furious, he's skilled, he's got mean weapons and an even meaner mustache. It's nothing personal. It's just business.



Chains of Fury is a unique Metroidvania Boomer Shooter. Inspired by Hellboy and Lobo comics along with XIII and Void Bastards games, it aims to give players a one-of-a-kind gaming experience.
Heavily influenced by retro FPS games it brings the character design inspiration of Duke Nukem 3D, movement guidelines of Quake and DOOM, and unique comic-book style graphics based on 90's hits such as Lobo. Nearly three decades on, the spirit of 1996 is somehow still with us, and we are not letting go. Neither should you.

KEY FEATURES:

Destructible walls - keys are for wimps. Smash your way through.
Hidden Secrets - loads of easter eggs & secrets wait to be found.
Retro inspired - Duke Nukem 3D, DOOM, Quake. We shoot for the top.
Dark Humor - we'd love to be able to say we're friends with Lobo, but... He'd pull our teeth out with his hook. At best. We hope. Sorry.
Fabulous moustache - being a mercenary does not mean you cannot look dashing and handsome like Peter Krylov.
Split screen multiplayer - help a buddy or kick his ass. Whatever.


You are a hired gun. Your former clients put you in prison instead of paying you. That was their last mistake. You will find them and you will get your money back. No world-saving, no zero to hero bullshit, no mercy. Itâ€™s nothing personal - itâ€™s just business.


There is no turning back. If something is slowing you down, just shoot and destroy it. Nearly all walls are destructible here.


This is gonna be bloody. Even punches and kicks get to be quite lethal here.


Use your environment to your advantage. Abysses, force fields, vortexes, spikes on the walls, and more. Put other vigilantes and anti-heroes to shame.


Shoot first, ask questions later. You are here "just" for furious mayhem. Choose from the guns that everyone knows and loves: minigun, shotgun, railgun and more. Rejoice in the real thrill of slaughtering scumbags standing in your way. Interact with the environment. Play how you want.


Each enemy has their own strengths and weaknesses, and there are plenty of them. Manage your resources and craft upgrades to defeat them.

data.short_description: Welcome to high adrenaline, fast-paced Metroidvania Boomer Shooter where you have only one goal: spread furious mayhem among the scumbags keeping you locked up. Stuck looking for an exit? Just punch through walls and then shoot the suckers behind them.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 Service Pack 1 , Windows 8 , Windows 10
  • Processor: CPU @ 4.0GHz (amd fx-8350 / i5-3570K equivalents or better)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 / AMD Radeon R9 280 equivalents or better
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Speakers or headphones
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 (64-bit) Service Pack 1, Windows 8 (64-bit), Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: CPU @ 4.0GHz (amd fx-8350 / i5-3570K equivalents or better)
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX1070 8GB or better
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Speakers or headphones
